last_episode_to_air.name: Piecing the Evidence
last_episode_to_air.overview: The second part of Catching A Killer tells the story of one man's attempt to clear his name in South Korea's most infamous serial murder investigation after spending 20 years in prison.

name: Catching a Killer - The Hwaseong Murders
original_name: Catching a Killer - The Hwaseong Murders
overview: South Korea's most infamous murder case involving one of the country's first known serial killers.

episodes.name: Time Will Tell
episodes.overview: South Korea's most infamous serial murder investigation. With testimony from the man convicted of the crime, Catching A Killer recounts the original case and the new evidence that changed it all.

episodes.name: Piecing the Evidence
episodes.overview: The second part of Catching A Killer tells the story of one man's attempt to clear his name in South Korea's most infamous serial murder investigation after spending 20 years in prison.
